mapper.select: select tmp.serverSum as serverSum, tmp.serverOnLineSum as serverOnLineSum, tmp.serverSum - tmp.serverOnLineSum as serverOffLineSum, ifnull(round(tmp.serverOnLineSum / tmp.serverSum, 2) * 100, '100') as serverOnLineRate from ( select count(1) as serverSum, ifnull(sum(ms.IS_ONLINE), 0) as serverOnLineSum from MONITOR_SERVER ms) tmp
